activities.title: Beach Cleanup
activities.description: Join us for a community-led beach cleanup aimed at preserving our coastal environment. Together, we'll collect litter, remove plastic waste, and learn about the impact of pollution on marine life. It's a great way to contribute to a cleaner ocean and connect with others who care about the planet.

activities.title: Park Reforestation
activities.description: Help us restore green spaces in the city by planting trees and native plants. This initiative supports biodiversity, improves air quality, and enhances the beauty of our public parks. No previous experience neededâ€”just a love for nature!
instructions: Bring a shovel or gardening tools

activities.title: Community Fitness
activities.description: Start your day with an energizing group workout in the park! This free fitness session is open to all ages and abilities, focused on promoting healthy lifestyles through fun, inclusive exercise routines. Meet your neighbors and get moving together.
instructions: Wear workout clothes and running shoes

activities.title: Food Drive
activities.description: Help us support families in need by donating non-perishable food items. All contributions will be distributed to local shelters and community kitchens. Together, we can fight hunger and make a real difference.
instructions: Bring canned or dry food items
Spread the word to friends and neighbors
Stay to help with sorting and packing

activities.title: Street Art Festival
activities.description: Celebrate urban creativity at our Street Art Festival! Watch live mural painting, meet local artists, enjoy music, and discover how art transforms public spaces into vibrant community stories. All ages welcome!
instructions: Wear comfortable clothes and walking shoes
Respect the artists and their work

activities.title: Recycling Education
activities.description: Join our full-day Recycling Education event and learn how to reduce, reuse, and recycle effectively. Through talks, workshops, and interactive displays, you'll discover practical ways to live more sustainably and protect the environment.
instructions: Be prepared to take notes and ask questions
Participate in sorting demos and activities

activities.title: Clothing Donation and Sorting
activities.description: Help us collect and organize donated clothes for people in need. Volunteers will sort items by size, season, and condition to prepare them for distribution. Every item donated brings comfort and dignity to someone else.
instructions: Make sure all items are clean
Wear comfortable clothes for moving boxes
Label bags by category if possible
Stay to help with sorting and folding

activities.title: Charity Run
activities.description: Take part in a fun run to raise funds for local charities. Whether you jog, run, or walk, your participation helps support important community causes. Enjoy music, refreshments, and a great community spirit.
instructions: Check in early for bib pickup
Invite friends and family to join or cheer

activities.title: Animal Shelter Volunteering
activities.description: Volunteer at a local animal shelter and make a difference in the lives of rescued animals. You'll help with feeding, cleaning, and socializing with pets awaiting adoption. Great for animal lovers who want to give back.
instructions: Wear clothes you can get dirty
Be gentle and patient with animals
Help with cleaning and feeding tasks

activities.title: Language Teaching for Kids
activities.description: Support young learners by teaching them basic language skills through games, stories, and interactive lessons. Volunteers will work in small groups to help kids improve their speaking and understanding abilities in a fun, encouraging environment.
instructions: Prepare simple language games or flashcards
Bring notebooks or printouts if needed

activities.title: After-School Tutoring
activities.description: Volunteer as a tutor to help students with their homework, reading, or math after school. This is a chance to support children's education and make learning more accessible and enjoyable in a safe, supervised setting.
instructions: Be patient and flexible with students
Arrive on time and stay the full session
Coordinate with program leaders for assigned tasks
